data.claim: arXiv:2512.13564 "Memory in the Age of AI Agents" (47 authors, Dec 2025) provides taxonomy: Forms (token-level, parametric, latent), Functions (factual, experiential, working), Dynamics (formation, evolution, retrieval). Research frontiers: memory automation, RL integration, multimodal memory, multi-agent memory, trustworthiness.
data.snippet: Memory through unified lenses of forms, functions, and dynamics. Forms: token-level, parametric, latent. Functions: factual, experiential, working.
